Implementation of Quantified outputs I assessed the implementation of Twenty – one (21) out puts that were fully quantified with a total of forty - two (41) activities worth UGX. 2.61Bn and noted the following: 8 Six (6) outputs with a total of thirteen (13) activities worth UGX.1.17Bn were fully implemented. The entity implemented all the thirteen (13) activities (100%) within these outputs.  Nine (9) outputs with a total of Twenty - two (22) activities worth UGX.1.43Bn were partially implemented.
